speaker: Zoe
text: We planned to release the beta version last week, but a few unexpected bugs came up.
ipa: wi ˈplænd tə ɹɪˈlis ðə ˈbeɪtə ˈvɝʒən læst wik | bət ə fju ˌʌnɪkˈspɛktɪd bʌɡz keɪm ʌp
stress: WE PLANNED to RELEASE the BETA VERSION last WEEK | but a FEW UNEXPECTED BUGS CAME UP
linking:
"planned to" → /plænd tə/ (d + t linking)
"came up" → /keɪm ʌp/ (m + u linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Yeah, I remember fixing that authentication issue, but then the payment gateway started failing.
ipa: jæ | aɪ ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ ˈfɪksɪŋ ðæt ˌɔθənˈtɪkeɪʃən ˈɪʃu | bət ðɛn ðə ˈpeɪmənt ˈɡeɪtˌweɪ ˈstɑɹtɪd ˈfeɪlɪŋ
stress: YEAH | I REMEMBER FIXING that AUTHENTICATION ISSUE | but THEN the PAYMENT GATEWAY STARTED FAILING
linking:
"remember fixing" → /ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ ˈfɪksɪŋ/ (r + f linking)
"started failing" → /ˈstɑɹtɪd ˈfeɪlɪŋ/ (d + f linking)

speaker: Zoe
text: Exactly. At this point, we can't stand delaying the launch any longer. We have to move forward.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | æt ðɪs pɔɪnt | wi kænt stænd dɪˈleɪɪŋ ðə lɔntʃ ˈɛni ˈlɔŋɡɚ | wi hæv tə muv ˈfɔɹwɚd
stress: EXACTLY | At THIS POINT | we CAN'T STAND DELAYING the LAUNCH ANY LONGER | we HAVE to MOVE FORWARD
linking:
"can't stand" → /kænt stænd/ (t + s linking)
"have to" → /hæv tə/ (v + t linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Agreed. I offered to stay late tonight to finish the last few tasks.
ipa: əˈɡɹid | aɪ ˈɔfɚd tə steɪ leɪt təˈnaɪt tə ˈfɪnɪʃ ðə læst fju tæsks
stress: AGREED | I OFFERED to STAY LATE TONIGHT to FINISH the LAST FEW TASKS
linking:
"offered to" → /ˈɔfɚd tə/ (d + t linking)
"stay late" → /steɪ leɪt/ (y + l linking)

speaker: Zoe
text: Thanks! That might help us hit our new deadline. I insist on testing everything manually before we push it live.
ipa: θæŋks | ðæt maɪt hɛlp ʌs hɪt aʊɹ nu ˈdɛdˌlaɪn | aɪ ɪnˈsɪst ɑn ˈtɛstɪŋ ˈɛvɹiθɪŋ ˈmænjʊəli bɪˈfɔɹ wi pʊʃ ɪt laɪv
stress: THANKS | That MIGHT HELP us HIT our NEW DEADLINE | I INSIST on TESTING EVERYTHING MANUALLY BEFORE we PUSH it LIVE
linking:
"help us" → /hɛlp ʌs/ (p + u linking)
"push it" → /pʊʃ ɪt/ (sh + i linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Good idea. Also, the marketing team suggested preparing a last-minute demo video. They want us to highlight the new features.
ipa: ɡʊd aɪˈdiə | ˈɔlsoʊ | ðə ˈmɑɹkɪtɪŋ tim səɡˈʤɛstɪd pɹɪˈpɛɹɪŋ ə læst ˈmɪnɪt ˈdɛmoʊ ˈvɪdioʊ | ðeɪ wɑnt ʌs tə ˈhaɪˌlaɪt ðə nu ˈfiʧɚz
stress: GOOD IDEA | ALSO | the MARKETING TEAM SUGGESTED PREPARING a LAST-MINUTE DEMO VIDEO | They WANT us to HIGHLIGHT the NEW FEATURES
linking:
"marketing team" → /ˈmɑɹkɪtɪŋ tim/ (ng + t linking)
"highlight the" → /ˈhaɪˌlaɪt ðə/ (t + th linking)

speaker: Zoe
text: We need to organize that fast. Maybe we could ask Nathan to help with editing?
ipa: wi nid tə ˈɔɹɡəˌnaɪz ðæt fæst | ˈmeɪbi wi kʊd æsk ˈneɪθən tə hɛlp wɪð ˈɛdɪtɪŋ
stress: We NEED to ORGANIZE that FAST | MAYBE we could ASK NATHAN to HELP with EDITING
linking:
"need to" → /nid tə/ (d + t linking)
"ask Nathan" → /æsk ˈneɪθən/ (k + n linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Yeah, Nathan agreed to help last time, so he might not mind doing it again.
ipa: jæ | ˈneɪθən əˈɡɹid tə hɛlp læst taɪm | soʊ hi maɪt nɑt maɪnd ˈduɪŋ ɪt əˈɡɛn
stress: YEAH | NATHAN AGREED to HELP LAST TIME | so HE MIGHT NOT MIND DOING it AGAIN
linking:
"agreed to" → /əˈɡɹid tə/ (d + t linking)
"doing it" → /ˈduɪŋ ɪt/ (ng + i linking)

speaker: Zoe
text: I'll try calling him after this meeting.
ipa: aɪl tɹaɪ ˈkɑlɪŋ hɪm ˈæftɚ ðɪs ˈmitɪŋ
stress: I'LL TRY CALLING him AFTER this MEETING
linking:
"calling him" → /ˈkɑlɪŋ hɪm/ (ng + h linking)
"after this" → /ˈæftɚ ðɪs/ (r + th linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Perfect. By the way, I prefer handling backend tasks, but if needed, I don't mind fixing some frontend bugs too.
ipa: ˈpɝfɪkt | baɪ ðə weɪ | aɪ pɹɪˈfɝ ˈhændlɪŋ ˈbækˌɛnd tæsks | bət ɪf ˈnidɪd | aɪ doʊnt maɪnd ˈfɪksɪŋ səm ˈfɹʌntˌɛnd bʌɡz tu
stress: PERFECT | BY the WAY | I PREFER HANDLING BACKEND TASKS | but IF NEEDED | I DON'T MIND FIXING some FRONTEND BUGS TOO
linking:
"prefer handling" → /pɹɪˈfɝ ˈhændlɪŋ/ (r + h linking)
"fixing some" → /ˈfɪksɪŋ səm/ (ng + s linking)

speaker: Zoe
text: Thanks, Liam. We all must keep supporting each other until launch day!
ipa: θæŋks ˈliəm | wi ɔl məst kip səˈpɔɹtɪŋ iʧ ˈʌðɚ ənˈtɪl lɔntʃ deɪ
stress: THANKS, LIAM | We ALL MUST KEEP SUPPORTING EACH OTHER UNTIL LAUNCH DAY
linking:
"keep supporting" → /kip səˈpɔɹtɪŋ/ (p + s linking)
"each other" → /iʧ ˈʌðɚ/ (ch + o linking)

speaker: Liam
text: Definitely. Launching a product always involves making sacrifices, but it’s so worth it in the end.
ipa: ˈdɛfənətli | ˈlɔntʃɪŋ ə ˈpɹɑdəkt ˈɔlweɪz ɪnˈvɑlvz ˈmeɪkɪŋ ˈsækrəˌfaɪsɪz | bət ɪts soʊ wɝθ ɪt ɪn ði ɛnd
stress: DEFINITELY | LAUNCHING a PRODUCT ALWAYS INVOLVES MAKING SACRIFICES | but it’s SO WORTH it in the END
linking:
"launching a" → /ˈlɔntʃɪŋ ə/ (ng + a linking)
"making sacrifices" → /ˈmeɪkɪŋ ˈsækrəˌfaɪsɪz/ (ng + s linking)
"worth it" → /wɝθ ɪt/ (th + i linking)
